artist: Designer: Lori Weitzner; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Ornate damask swirling shapes overlaid with diamond shapes with eyelash edges. Vert. Rpt. 27.5; horiz. Rpt. 11". Garnet red. Garnet
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Lori Weitzner
text: Weitzner has long been fascinated by universal archetypes. Inspiration for the  Paradigm Collection draws upon a number of basic concepts and their frequent relationship to geometric forms such as the spiral and its reference to growth and change, the triangle/diamond encouraging vision, and the stability inherent in the square.
title: Destiny
